page.title: 16CLAY PIGEON SHOOTING
page.content: {CLAY PIGEON SHOOTING(CONT) picked up also.They are for normal shooting.Flurescent orange versions are used for shooting against trees some boys and girls in class 8 go shooting regulary with their parents they mainly live on the N/E part of our grid area which is in open countryside.Areas on our grid for clay pigeon shooting are(1)BOCKENDON GRANGE (2)BURTON GREEN(3)BIG POORS WOOD (4)LITTLE POORS WOOD(5)CHASE FARM (INCORPORATED WITH DRIVEN GAME) {LIVE GAME} Chase Wood is used for pheasant&pigeon shooting.Mr Talbot is a part-time game keeper.There is a release pen in the wood,there are over a 1,000 pheasants in it.Mr Weetman has released Red legged partridge in to the area they often go in peoples gardens.They have survived and bred for three years.
